attributes.action: Do not make covid 19 vaccines compulsory for health and social care workers.
attributes.additional_details: It is a fundamental human right to make decisions about medical procedures and it is treading on dangerous ground to force people to take a potentially dangerous, experimental vaccine.
attributes.background: Let health and social care workers have the freedom of choice about the covid 19 vaccine.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
